label: Knight School Entrance 3
description:
John decides that maybe the best way to get a badge might be to build one if he can get the right components.
A badge is in the shape of a shield, with a mini coat-of-arms at the top and a name at the bottom.
John is able to get objects to build a badge from the various sovenir stands.

Hit 1 if you wish to proceed.

Hit 0 to quit.
